p: We used 31 blood samples from a fever study in Tanzania, 2013 ( Table 2). Twenty-six samples had been confirmed as DENV2 positive by the Swiss Tropical and Public Health Institute (Basel, Switzerland) (2 of them were not tested by qRT-PCR). Aliquots of these blood samples were sent to MAST Diagnostica GmbH and stored at -20°C until RNA extraction was performed using the Magnamedics kit trial version. RNA samples were stored at -80°C. RT-LAMP reactions were run in the TubeScanner TS2 (QIAGEN), using 5 μL RNA of each sample per reaction.
